title: Zombie Off
description: It's not always about a cure.One man thought differently than the rest, and the result was ZOMBIE OFF. A product that allows you to walk among the undead; unseen, unnoticed. Abe Morrow could have been the hero, but power can be a terrible temptress. In an effort to solidify his empire, Morrow turns to murder. And in the process, he crosses the wrong man.
author: Scott   Lee
